original_title: Vogue Jewellers makes second donation to WWCT for leopard conservation in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: Vogue Jewellers recently unveiled a new ‘Iconic Collection’ representing Sri Lanka’s treasures. One of them is the individually handcrafted collection, ‘Save the Leopard’, inspired by Sri Lankan flora and fauna.

The 22kt yellow, rose and white gold Pendants are distinctive and set with Swarovski Cubic Zirconia stones. Customers have the option of customizing the Pendants and Cufflinks and even order Brooches in the same designs with precious stones on request.
“We’re pleased to announce that with the help of our customers and our partner WWCT, we’re making a difference in protecting Sri Lankan leopards,” Vogue jewelers said.

“In December 2022, Vogue Jewellers made an inaugural donation to Wilderness & Wildlife Conservation Trust (WWTC). Today, we have made our second donation continuing our commitment to protect these majestic creatures. This donation will directly contribute to the WWCT Leopard project and will have a positive impact on Leopard Conservation in Sri Lanka,” Vogue Jewellers said.
Interview with Cassandra Fernando MP, prominent Australian politician of Sri Lankan origin
